sentences.en: He was inexperienced in stock jobbery and got his fingers burned in the stock market.
sentences.cn: 他对股票买卖缺乏经验,在股票市场上吃了亏.

sentences.en: Party B causes great loss to A due to its breach of duty and jobbery.
sentences.cn: 乙方严重失职,营私舞弊,给甲方利益造成重大损失.

sentences.en: To overdo anything public may lead to jobbery, while appropriate selfishness may promote the growth.
sentences.cn: “公”字过头可能假公济私，私心适度也会促进发展。

trans.tran_en: the practice of making private profit out of a public office; corruption or graft
